hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.bulkentry.business.BulkEntryCustomerAccountInstallmentView( accountAction.account.accountId,customer.customerId,accountAction.installmentId, accountAction.actionDateId,accountAction.actionDate, accountAction.miscFee,accountAction.miscFeePaid, accountAction.miscPenalty,accountAction.miscPenaltyPaid ) from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerScheduleEntity as accountAction, org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.customerId = accountAction.customer.customerId and accountAction.actionDate <= date(:MEETING_DATE) and accountAction.paymentStatus=:PAYMENT_STATUS and customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerStatus.id in (3,4,9,10,13) order by customer.customerId, accountAction.account.accountId,accountAction.actionDate

select new org.mifos.application.bulkentry.business.BulkEntryCustomerAccountInstallmentView( accountAction.account.accountId,customer.customerId,accountAction.installmentId, accountAction.actionDateId,accountAction.actionDate, accountAction.miscFee,accountAction.miscFeePaid, accountAction.miscPenalty,accountAction.miscPenaltyPaid ) from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerScheduleEntity as accountAction, org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.customerId = accountAction.customer.customerId and accountAction.actionDate <= date(:MEETING_DATE) and accountAction.paymentStatus=:PAYMENT_STATUS and customer.searchId=:SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerStatus.id in (3,4,9,10,13) order by customer.customerId, accountAction.account.accountId,accountAction.actionDate

select accountActionDateEntity.account.accountId from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerScheduleEntity accountActionDateEntity where accountActionDateEntity.account.accountType.accountTypeId=:CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID and accountActionDateEntity.customer.customerStatus.id in (:ACTIVE_CENTER_STATE, :ACTIVE_GROUP_STATE, :ACTIVE_CLIENT_STATE, :ONHOLD_CLIENT_STATE, :ONHOLD_GROUP_STATE) and accountActionDateEntity.actionDate=date(:CURRENT_DATE)
